subject: Baseball
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: The new director of the M.L.B. players union said that “the page has been turned” on Alex Rodriguez’s short-lived lawsuit that implicated the union and a respected former director.
snippet: The new director of the M.L.B. players union said that “the page has been turned” on Alex Rodriguez’s short-lived lawsuit that implicated the union and a respected former director.
